email_template.subject: Security Assessment Report - {domain}
email_template.intro: Please find attached the comprehensive security assessment report for your domain.
email_template.action_items: We recommend reviewing the high-priority items in the Executive Summary and Implementation Plan sections. Our team is available to assist with implementing any of the suggested security improvements.
email_template.closing:
If you have any questions about this assessment or need assistance with implementation, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Thank you for choosing us for your security assessment needs.

_comments.auth_method: Must be 'oauth2' - Uses Microsoft Graph API with OAuth2 authentication
_comments.client_id: Application (client) ID from Azure App Registration
_comments.client_secret: Client secret VALUE (not ID) from Azure App Registration - Certificates & secrets
_comments.tenant_id: Directory (tenant) ID from Azure App Registration
_comments.sender_name: Name that will appear as the sender in emails
_comments.default_recipient: Default email address if none provided on command line
_comments.setup_instructions: See README.md for complete Azure App Registration setup guide
_comments.required_permissions: Mail.Send (Application permission) with admin consent granted
